sqlMap.select: SELECT DOC_ID FROM TBBADJFS004D WHERE 1=1 AND MNTY_FRM_SRNO = #MNTY_FRM_SRNO#

SELECT T1.DPT_CD /*부서코드*/ , F_DPT_INFO(T1.DPT_CD, '1') AS DPT_NM /*부서명*/ , T1.SLN /*연번*/ , T1.AUD_YR /*감사연도*/ , T1.AUD_NO /*감사번호*/ , T4.AUD_GRN_NO /*감사부여번호 - 2016.06.01 yyh*/ , CASE WHEN T4.AUD_YR >= '2016' THEN T4.AUD_KND_CD ELSE '' END AS AUD_YR_NO_KND_CD /*감사연번호종류코드 추가 - 2015.12.28 yyh*/ , T4.AUD_SBJ_NM /*감사사항명*/ , T1.MNTY_INF_SMT_RQ_DOC_NO /*문서번호*/ , T1.TG_ORG_CD /*대상기관코드*/ , F_ORG_INFO(T1.TG_ORG_CD, '1') AS ORG_NM /*감사대상기관명*/ , T1.PUBOL_SRCH_PTOT_NOC /*조회건수순계(공직)*/ , T1.GEN_PSO_SRCH_PTOT_NOC /*조회건수순계(일반)*/ , T1.HND_TXT /*조치내용*/ , T1.RMK_SBJ /*비고*/ , T1.YR /*연도*/ , T1.DOC_ID , T1.DOC_TYP_CD , T1.TG_ORG_NM /*대상기관명*/ FROM TBBADJFS001M T1 /*금융정보요구사항*/ , TBBADDED001M T4 /*감사사항*/ WHERE 1=1 AND T1.AUD_NO = T4.AUD_NO(+) AND T1.AUD_YR = T4.AUD_YR(+)
AND T1.YR = #strYr#
AND T1.DPT_CD IN (SELECT DPT_CD FROM TABLE(F_AUTH_DEPT(#strCnb#, #strDptAuth#, '', #strDptCd#)))
AND T1.DPT_CD = #strDptCd2#
/* 감사연번종류코드 - 2015.12.28 yyh */ AND SUBSTR(T4.AUD_KND_CD,3,1) = SUBSTR(#strAudYrNoKndCd#,3,1)
AND T1.AUD_YR = #strAudYr# AND T4.AUD_GRN_NO = #strAudGrnNo#
AND T1.AUD_YR = #strAudSbjYr# AND T1.AUD_NO = #strAudSbjCd#
AND T1.TG_ORG_NM LIKE '%' || #strSchTxt# || '%'
ORDER BY T1.YR DESC, T1.DPT_CD ASC, T1.SLN DESC

SELECT T1.DPT_CD /*부서코드*/ , F_DPT_INFO(T1.DPT_CD, '1') AS DPT_NM /*부서명*/ , T1.SLN /*연번*/ , T1.AUD_YR /*감사연도*/ , T1.AUD_NO /*감사번호*/ , T4.AUD_GRN_NO /*감사부여번호 - 2016.06.01 yyh*/ , T4.AUD_SBJ_NM /*감사사항명*/ , T1.MNTY_INF_SMT_RQ_DOC_NO /*문서번호*/ , T1.TG_ORG_CD /*대상기관코드*/ , F_ORG_INFO(T1.TG_ORG_CD, '1') AS ORG_NM /*감사대상기관명*/ , T1.PUBOL_SRCH_PTOT_NOC /*조회건수순계(공직)*/ , T1.GEN_PSO_SRCH_PTOT_NOC /*조회건수순계(일반)*/ , T1.HND_TXT /*조치내용*/ , T1.RMK_SBJ /*비고*/ , T1.YR /*연도*/ , T1.DOC_ID , T1.DOC_TYP_CD , T1.TG_ORG_NM /*대상기관명*/ FROM TBBADJFS001M T1 /*금융정보요구사항*/ , TBBADDED001M T4 /*감사사항*/ WHERE 1=1 AND T1.AUD_NO = T4.AUD_NO(+) AND T1.AUD_YR = T4.AUD_YR(+) AND T1.YR = #YR# AND T1.DPT_CD = #DPT_CD# AND T1.SLN = #SLN# ORDER BY T1.YR DESC, T1.DPT_CD ASC, T1.SLN DESC

SELECT YR /*년도*/ , DPT_CD /*부서코드*/ , SLN /*연번*/ , IS_NO /*발부번호*/ , IS_DT /*발부일*/ , NAM /*성명*/ , EIN /*암호화주민등록번호*/ , CMPY_NM /*회사명*/ , BZN /*사업자등록번호*/ , EAN /*암호화계좌번호*/ , MNTY_ORG_NM /*금융기관명*/ , BRC_NM /*지점출장소명*/ , ETC_SBJ /*기타*/ , USE_PPS_CD /*사용목적코드*/ , RQ_DEAL_INF_HIS /*요구거래정보내역*/ , ACP_DT /*접수일*/ , PUBOL_DVSN_YN /*공직자구분여부*/ , PUBOL_SRCH_NOC /*공직자조회건수*/ , GEN_PSO_SRCH_NOC /*일반인조회건수*/ , AUD_PEN_NAM /*감사자명*/ , PUBOL_DVSN_YN /*공직자구분여부*/ , ACT_INF_NM /*계좌정보명*/ , MNTY_ORG_INF_NM /*금융기관정보명*/ FROM TBBADJFS002D WHERE 1=1
AND YR = #strYr# AND DPT_CD = #strDptCd# AND SLN = #strSln#
ORDER BY SLN , IS_NO DESC

SELECT T1.SLN /*연번*/ , T1.AUD_YR /*감사연도*/ , T1.AUD_NO /*감사번호*/ , T3.AUD_GRN_NO /*감사부여번호 - 2016.06.01 yyh*/ , CASE WHEN T3.AUD_YR >= '2016' THEN F_CODE_NM('1000739', T3.AUD_KND_CD) ELSE '' END AS AUD_YR_NO_KND_NM /*감사연번호종류코드 추가 - 2015.12.28 yyh*/ , T3.AUD_SBJ_NM /*감사사항명*/ , T2.AUD_PEN_NAM /*감사자명*/ , T1.MNTY_INF_SMT_RQ_DOC_NO /*문서번호*/ , F_ORG_INFO(T1.TG_ORG_CD, '1') AS ORG_NM /*감사대상기관명*/ , T1.PUBOL_SRCH_PTOT_NOC /*조회건수순계(공직)*/ , T1.GEN_PSO_SRCH_PTOT_NOC /*조회건수순계(일반)*/ , T2.PUBOL_SRCH_NOC /*공직자조회건수*/ , T2.GEN_PSO_SRCH_NOC /*일반인조회건수*/ , T1.HND_TXT /*조치내용*/ , T1.RMK_SBJ /*비고*/ , T2.IS_NO /*발부번호*/ , T2.IS_DT /*발부일*/ , T2.NAM /*성명*/ , T2.EIN /*암호화주민등록번호*/ , T2.CMPY_NM /*회사명*/ , T2.BZN /*사업자등록번호*/ , T2.EAN /*암호화계좌번호*/ , T2.MNTY_ORG_NM /*금융기관명*/ , T2.BRC_NM /*지점출장소명*/ , T2.ETC_SBJ /*기타*/ , DECODE(T2.USE_PPS_CD,'1','회계','2','금융') AS USE_PPS_NM /*사용목적*/ , T2.RQ_DEAL_INF_HIS /*요구거래정보내역*/ , T2.ACP_DT /*접수일*/ , DECODE(T2.PUBOL_DVSN_YN,'N','일반인','Y','공직자') AS PUBOL_DVSN_YN /*공직자구분여부*/ , T1.YR /*연도*/ , T1.DPT_CD /*부서코드*/ , F_DPT_INFO(T1.DPT_CD, '1') AS DPT_NM /*부서명*/ , T1.TG_ORG_NM /*대상기관명*/ FROM TBBADJFS001M T1 , TBBADJFS002D T2 , TBBADDED001M T3 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.YR = T2.YR(+) AND T1.DPT_CD = T2.DPT_CD(+) AND T1.SLN = T2.SLN(+) AND T1.AUD_YR = T3.AUD_YR(+) AND T1.AUD_NO = T3.AUD_NO(+)
AND T1.YR = #strYr#
AND T1.DPT_CD IN (SELECT DPT_CD FROM TABLE(F_AUTH_DEPT(#strCnb#, #strDptAuth#, '', #strDptCd#)))
AND T1.DPT_CD = #strDptCd2#
AND T1.AUD_YR = #strAudSbjYr# AND T1.AUD_NO = #strAudSbjCd#
/* 감사연번종류코드 - 2015.12.28 yyh */ AND SUBSTR(T3.AUD_KND_CD,3,1) = #strAudYrNoKndCd#
AND T1.AUD_YR = #strAudYr# AND T3.AUD_GRN_NO = #strAudGrnNo#
ORDER BY T1.YR DESC, T1.DPT_CD ASC, T1.SLN DESC

SELECT T1.YR /*년도*/, T1.DPT_CD /*부서코드*/, '' AS AUD_NO /*감사번호*/, '' AS AUD_YR /*감사연도*/, '' AS AUD_SBJ_NM /*감사사항*/, T1.SLN /*연번*/, T1.IS_NO /*발부번호*/, T1.IS_DT /*발부일*/, T1.NAM /*성명*/, T1.EIN /*암호화주민등록번호*/, T1.CMPY_NM /*회사명*/, T1.BZN /*사업자등록번호*/, T1.EAN /*암호화계좌번호*/, T1.MNTY_ORG_NM /*금융기관명*/, T1.BRC_NM /*지점출장소명*/, T1.ETC_SBJ /*기타*/, DECODE(T1.USE_PPS_CD,'1','회계','2','금융') AS USE_PPS_CD /*사용목적*/, T1.RQ_DEAL_INF_HIS /*요구거래정보내역*/, T1.ACP_DT /*접수일*/, DECODE(T1.PUBOL_DVSN_YN,'N','일반인','Y','공직자') AS PUBOL_DVSN_YN /*공직자구분여부*/ FROM TBBADJFS002D T1 WHERE 1=1
AND YR = #strYr# AND DPT_CD = #strDptCd# AND SLN = #strSln#
ORDER BY SLN, IS_NO DESC
SELECT TO_CHAR(COUNT(*)) as CNT FROM TBBADJFS002D WHERE YR = #YR# AND DPT_CD = #DPT_CD# AND SLN = #SLN#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TBBADJFS001M ( YR , DPT_CD , AUD_NO , AUD_YR , SLN , MNTY_INF_SMT_RQ_DOC_NO , TG_ORG_CD , PUBOL_SRCH_PTOT_NOC , GEN_PSO_SRCH_PTOT_NOC , HND_TXT , RMK_SBJ , DOC_ID , TG_ORG_NM , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , FRT_REGI_DH , FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( #YR# , #DPT_CD# , #AUD_NO# , #AUD_YR# , #SLN# , #MNTY_INF_SMT_RQ_DOC_NO# , #TG_ORG_CD# , #PUBOL_SRCH_PTOT_NOC# , #GEN_PSO_SRCH_PTOT_NOC# , #HND_TXT# , #RMK_SBJ# , #DOC_ID# , #TG_ORG_NM# , #FRT_USR_ID# , #FNL_USR_ID# , #FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD# , #FNL_MNU_ID# , SYSDATE , SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO TBBADJFS002D ( YR, /*년도*/ DPT_CD, /*부서코드*/ SLN, /*연번*/ IS_NO, /*발부번호*/ IS_DT, /*발부일*/ NAM, /*성명*/ EIN, /*암호화주민등록번호*/ CMPY_NM, /*회사명*/ BZN, /*사업자등록번호*/ EAN, /*암호화계좌번호*/ MNTY_ORG_NM, /*금융기관명*/ BRC_NM, /*지점출장소명*/ ETC_SBJ, /*기타*/ USE_PPS_CD, /*사용목적코드*/ RQ_DEAL_INF_HIS, /*요구거래정보내역*/ ACP_DT, /*접수일*/ PUBOL_SRCH_NOC, /*공직자조회건수*/ GEN_PSO_SRCH_NOC, /*일반인조회건수*/ AUD_PEN_NAM, /*감사자명*/ PUBOL_DVSN_YN, /*공직자구분여부*/ ACT_INF_NM, /*계좌정보명*/ MNTY_ORG_INF_NM, /*금융기관정보명*/ FRT_USR_ID, /*최초사용자ID*/ FNL_USR_ID, /*최종사용자ID*/ FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD, /*최종거래부서코드*/ FNL_MNU_ID, /*최종메뉴ID*/ FRT_REGI_DH, /*최초등록일시*/ FNL_MDF_DH /*최종수정일시*/ ) VALUES ( #YR#, #DPT_CD#, #SLN#, #IS_NO#, #IS_DT#, #NAM#, #EIN#, #CMPY_NM#, #BZN#, #EAN#, #MNTY_ORG_NM#, #BRC_NM#, #ETC_SBJ#, #USE_PPS_CD#, #RQ_DEAL_INF_HIS#, #ACP_DT#, #PUBOL_SRCH_NOC#, #GEN_PSO_SRCH_NOC#, #AUD_PEN_NAM#, #PUBOL_DVSN_YN#, #ACT_INF_NM#, #MNTY_ORG_INF_NM#, #FRT_USR_ID#, #FNL_USR_ID#, #FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD#, #FNL_MNU_ID#, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TBBADJFS001M SET FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE /*최종수정일시*/
SLN = #SLN# /*연번*/
MNTY_INF_SMT_RQ_DOC_NO = #MNTY_INF_SMT_RQ_DOC_NO# /*문서번호*/
TG_ORG_CD = #TG_ORG_CD# /*대상기관코드*/
PUBOL_SRCH_PTOT_NOC = #PUBOL_SRCH_PTOT_NOC# /*조회건수순계공직*/
GEN_PSO_SRCH_PTOT_NOC = #GEN_PSO_SRCH_PTOT_NOC# /*조회건수순계일반*/
HND_TXT = #HND_TXT# /*조치내용*/
RMK_SBJ = #RMK_SBJ# /*비고*/
TG_ORG_NM = #TG_ORG_NM# /*대상기관명*/
FNL_USR_ID = #FNL_USR_ID# /*최종사용자ID*/
FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD# /*최종거래부서코드*/
WHERE YR = #YR# AND DPT_CD = #DPT_CD# AND SLN = #SLN#

UPDATE TBBADJFS002D SET FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE /*최종수정일시*/
IS_DT = #IS_DT# /*발부일*/
NAM = #NAM# /*성명*/
EIN = #EIN# /*암호화주민등록번호*/
CMPY_NM = #CMPY_NM# /*회사명*/
BZN = #BZN# /*사업자등록번호*/
EAN = #EAN# /*암호화계좌번호*/
MNTY_ORG_NM = #MNTY_ORG_NM# /*금융기관명*/
BRC_NM = #BRC_NM# /*지점출장소명*/
ETC_SBJ = #ETC_SBJ# /*기타*/
USE_PPS_CD = #USE_PPS_CD# /*사용목적코드*/
RQ_DEAL_INF_HIS = #RQ_DEAL_INF_HIS# /*요구거래정보내역*/
ACP_DT = #ACP_DT# /*접수일*/
PUBOL_SRCH_NOC = #PUBOL_SRCH_NOC# /*공직자조회건수*/
GEN_PSO_SRCH_NOC = #GEN_PSO_SRCH_NOC# /*일반인조회건수*/
PUBOL_DVSN_YN = #PUBOL_DVSN_YN# /*공직자구분여부*/
AUD_PEN_NAM = #AUD_PEN_NAM# /*감사자명*/
ACT_INF_NM = #ACT_INF_NM# /*계좌정보명*/
MNTY_ORG_INF_NM = #MNTY_ORG_INF_NM# /*금융기관정보명*/
FNL_USR_ID = #FNL_USR_ID# /*최종사용자ID*/
FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD# /*최종거래부서코드*/
WHERE YR = #YR# AND DPT_CD = #DPT_CD# AND SLN = #SLN# AND IS_NO = #IS_NO#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TBBADJFS001M WHERE YR = #YR# AND DPT_CD = #DPT_CD# AND SLN = #SLN#
DELETE FROM TBBADJFS002D WHERE YR = #YR# AND DPT_CD = #DPT_CD# AND SLN = #SLN# AND IS_NO = #IS_NO#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TBBADJFS001M SET FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE /*최종수정일시*/
DOC_ID = #DOC_ID# /*문서ID*/
DOC_TYP_CD = #DOC_TYP_CD# /*문서유형코드*/
FNL_USR_ID = #FNL_USR_ID# /*최종사용자ID*/
FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD# /*최종거래부서코드*/
FNL_MNU_ID = #FNL_MNU_ID# /*최종메뉴ID*/
WHERE YR = #YR# AND DPT_CD = #DPT_CD# AND AUD_NO = #AUD_NO# AND AUD_YR = #AUD_YR# AND SLN = #SLN#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TBBADJFS004D ( MNTY_FRM_SRNO , DOC_ID , DOC_TYP_CD , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , FRT_REGI_DH , FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(MNTY_FRM_SRNO),0)+1 FROM TBBADJFS004D ) , #DOC_ID# , #DOC_TYP_CD# , #FRT_USR_ID# , #FNL_USR_ID# , #FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD# , #FNL_MNU_ID# , SYSDATE , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TBBADJFS004D SET FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE /*최종수정일시*/
DOC_ID = #DOC_ID# /*문서ID*/
DOC_TYP_CD = #DOC_TYP_CD# /*문서유형코드*/
FNL_USR_ID = #FNL_USR_ID# /*최종사용자ID*/
FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD# /*최종거래부서코드*/
FNL_MNU_ID = #FNL_MNU_ID# /*최종메뉴ID*/
WHERE MNTY_FRM_SRNO = #MNTY_FRM_SRNO#
sqlMap.select: SELECT F_DPT_INFO(#strDptCd#,'6') AS GCC_DPT_CD ,D2.FRML_DPT_NM AS GCC_DPT_NM ,D1.RANK_NM_2 AS POSITION_NM FROM TBDCMACM001M D1 ,TBDCMACM002M D2 WHERE D1.DPT_CD = D2.DPT_CD AND D1.CNB = #strScnb#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TBBADJFS001M /* 금융정보제출요구사항기본 */ SET ONR_SEN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') /* 온나라발송일 */ ,ONR_SEN_PEN_ID = #ONR_SEN_PEN_ID# /* 온나라발송자ID */ ,ONR_DOC_MNG_CRD_ID = #ONR_DOC_MNG_CRD_ID# /* 온나라문서관리카드ID */
,FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE /* 최종수정일시 */ ,FNL_USR_ID = #FNL_USR_ID# /* 최종사용자ID */ ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD# /* 최종거래부서코드 */ ,FNL_MNU_ID = #FNL_MNU_ID# /* 최종메뉴ID */ WHERE YR = #YR# /* 년도 */ AND DPT_CD = #DPT_CD# /* 부서코드 */ AND SLN = #SLN# /* 연번 */
sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.DPT_CD /*부서코드*/ , F_DPT_INFO(T1.DPT_CD, '1') AS DPT_NM /*부서명*/ , T1.SLN /*연번*/ , T1.AUD_YR /*감사연도*/ , T1.AUD_NO /*감사번호*/ , T4.AUD_SBJ_NM /*감사사항명*/ , T1.MNTY_INF_SMT_RQ_DOC_NO /*문서번호*/ , T1.TG_ORG_CD /*대상기관코드*/ , F_ORG_INFO(T1.TG_ORG_CD, '1') AS ORG_NM /*감사대상기관명*/ , T1.PUBOL_SRCH_PTOT_NOC /*조회건수순계(공직)*/ , T1.GEN_PSO_SRCH_PTOT_NOC /*조회건수순계(일반)*/ , T1.HND_TXT /*조치내용*/ , T1.RMK_SBJ /*비고*/ , T1.YR /*연도*/ , T1.DOC_ID , T1.DOC_TYP_CD , T1.ONR_SEN_DT /*온나라발송일 */ , T1.ONR_SEN_PEN_ID /*온나라발송자ID */ , T1.OPM_TXT /*시행문내용 */ , T1.ONR_DOC_MNG_CRD_ID /*온나라문서관리카드ID */ , T1.CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD /*민원시행문결재처리상태코드 */ , T1.ADMN_INF_HNDL_NO /*행정정보처리번호 */ , T1.ONR_APV_RQS_DH /*온나라결재요청일시 */ , T1.ONR_APV_CMPT_DH /*온나라결재완료일시 */ , T1.TG_ORG_NM /*대상기관명*/ , T2.FL_RUT_NM , T2.SYS_FL_NM FROM TBBADJFS001M T1 /*금융정보요구사항*/ , TBBADDED001M T4 /*감사사항*/ , TBDCMACM103L T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.AUD_NO = T4.AUD_NO(+) AND T1.AUD_YR = T4.AUD_YR(+) AND T1.ONR_DOC_MNG_CRD_ID = T2.ONR_DOC_MNG_CRD_ID(+) AND T1.YR = #strYr# AND T1.DPT_CD = #strDptCd# AND T1.SLN = #strSln#
SELECT NVL(MAX(IS_NO),0)+1 AS IS_NO FROM TBBADJFS002D WHERE YR = #YR# AND DPT_CD = #DPT_CD# AND SLN = #SLN#
SELECT NVL(MAX(SLN),0)+1 AS SLN FROM TBBADJFS001M WHERE YR = #YR# AND DPT_CD = #DPT_CD#
SELECT NVL(MAX(IS_NO),0)+1 AS IS_NO FROM TBBADJFS002D WHERE YR = #YR# AND DPT_CD = #DPT_CD# AND SLN = #SLN#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TBBADJFS001H ( HST_DVSN_CD /* 이력구분코드 */ , HST_SNO /* 이력순번 */ , HST_DH /* 이력일시 */ , HST_USR_ID /* 이력사용자ID */ , YR /* 년도 */ , DPT_CD /* 부서코드 */ , SLN /* 연번 */ , AUD_YR /* 감서년도 */ , AUD_NO /* 감사번호 */ , MNTY_INF_SMT_RQ_DOC_NO /* 금융정보제출요구문서번호 */ , TG_ORG_CD /* 대상기관코드 */ , PUBOL_SRCH_PTOT_NOC /* 공직자조회순계건수 */ , GEN_PSO_SRCH_PTOT_NOC /* 일반인조회순계건수 */ , HND_TXT /* 조치사항 */ , RMK_SBJ /* 비고사항 */ , DOC_ID /* 문서ID */ , DOC_TYP_CD /* 문서유형코드 */ , ONR_SEN_DT /* 온나라발송일 */ , ONR_SEN_PEN_ID /* 온나라발송자ID */ , OPM_TXT /* 시행문내용 */ , ONR_DOC_MNG_CRD_ID /* 온나라문서관리카드ID */ , CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD /* 민원시행문결재처리상태코드 */ , ADMN_INF_HNDL_NO /* 행정정보처리번호 */ , ONR_APV_RQS_DH /* 온나라결재요청일시 */ , ONR_APV_CMPT_DH /* 온나라결재완료일시 */ , TG_ORG_NM /* 대상기관명 */ , FRT_USR_ID /* 최초사용자ID */ , FNL_USR_ID /* 최종사용자ID */ , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD /* 최종거래부서코드 */ , FNL_MNU_ID /* 최종메뉴ID */ , FRT_REGI_DH /* 최초등록일시 */ , FNL_MDF_DH /* 최종수정일시 */ , REGI_RUT /* 등록경로 */ ) SELECT #HST_DVSN_CD# /* 이력구분코드 */ , TBBADJFS001H_SEQ.NEXTVAL /* 이력순번 */ , SYSDATE /* 이력일시 */ , #FRT_USR_ID# /* 이력사용자ID */ , YR /* 년도 */ , DPT_CD /* 부서코드 */ , SLN /* 연번 */ , AUD_YR /* 감서년도 */ , AUD_NO /* 감사번호 */ , MNTY_INF_SMT_RQ_DOC_NO /* 금융정보제출요구문서번호 */ , TG_ORG_CD /* 대상기관코드 */ , PUBOL_SRCH_PTOT_NOC /* 공직자조회순계건수 */ , GEN_PSO_SRCH_PTOT_NOC /* 일반인조회순계건수 */ , HND_TXT /* 조치사항 */ , RMK_SBJ /* 비고사항 */ , DOC_ID /* 문서ID */ , DOC_TYP_CD /* 문서유형코드 */ , ONR_SEN_DT /* 온나라발송일 */ , ONR_SEN_PEN_ID /* 온나라발송자ID */ , OPM_TXT /* 시행문내용 */ , ONR_DOC_MNG_CRD_ID /* 온나라문서관리카드ID */ , CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD /* 민원시행문결재처리상태코드 */ , ADMN_INF_HNDL_NO /* 행정정보처리번호 */ , ONR_APV_RQS_DH /* 온나라결재요청일시 */ , ONR_APV_CMPT_DH /* 온나라결재완료일시 */ , TG_ORG_NM /* 대상기관명 */ , FRT_USR_ID /* 최초사용자ID */ , FNL_USR_ID /* 최종사용자ID */ , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD /* 최종거래부서코드 */ , FNL_MNU_ID /* 최종메뉴ID */ , FRT_REGI_DH /* 최초등록일시 */ , FNL_MDF_DH /* 최종수정일시 */ , REGI_RUT /* 등록경로 */ FROM TBBADJFS001M WHERE YR = #YR# AND DPT_CD = #DPT_CD# AND SLN = #SLN#

INSERT INTO TBBADJFS002H ( HST_DVSN_CD /* 이력구분코드 */ , HST_SNO /* 이력순번 */ , HST_DH /* 이력일시 */ , HST_USR_ID /* 이력사용자ID */ , YR /* 년도 */ , DPT_CD /* 부서코드 */ , SLN /* 연번 */ , IS_NO /* 발부번호 */ , IS_DT /* 발부일 */ , NAM /* 성명 */ , EIN /* 암호화주민등록번호 */ , CMPY_NM /* 회사명 */ , BZN /* 사업자등록번호 */ , EAN /* 암호화계좌번호 */ , MNTY_ORG_NM /* 금융기관명 */ , BRC_NM /* 지점명 */ , ETC_SBJ /* 기타사항 */ , USE_PPS_CD /* 사용목적코드 */ , RQ_DEAL_INF_HIS /* 요구거래정보내역 */ , ACP_DT /* 접수일 */ , PUBOL_SRCH_NOC /* 공직자조회건수 */ , GEN_PSO_SRCH_NOC /* 일반인조회건수 */ , PUBOL_DVSN_YN /* 공직자구분여부 */ , AUD_PEN_NAM /* 감사자성명 */ , ACT_INF_NM /* 계좌정보명 */ , MNTY_ORG_INF_NM /* 금융기관정보명 */ , FRT_USR_ID /* 최초사용자ID */ , FNL_USR_ID /* 최종사용자ID */ , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD /* 최종거래부서코드 */ , FNL_MNU_ID /* 최종메뉴 ID */ , FRT_REGI_DH /* 최초등록일시 */ , FNL_MDF_DH /* 최종수정일시 */ ) SELECT #HST_DVSN_CD# /* 이력구분코드 */ , TBBADJFS002H_SEQ.NEXTVAL /* 이력순번 */ , SYSDATE /* 이력일시 */ , #FRT_USR_ID# /* 이력사용자ID */ , YR /* 년도 */ , DPT_CD /* 부서코드 */ , SLN /* 연번 */ , IS_NO /* 발부번호 */ , IS_DT /* 발부일 */ , NAM /* 성명 */ , EIN /* 암호화주민등록번호 */ , CMPY_NM /* 회사명 */ , BZN /* 사업자등록번호 */ , EAN /* 암호화계좌번호 */ , MNTY_ORG_NM /* 금융기관명 */ , BRC_NM /* 지점명 */ , ETC_SBJ /* 기타사항 */ , USE_PPS_CD /* 사용목적코드 */ , RQ_DEAL_INF_HIS /* 요구거래정보내역 */ , ACP_DT /* 접수일 */ , PUBOL_SRCH_NOC /* 공직자조회건수 */ , GEN_PSO_SRCH_NOC /* 일반인조회건수 */ , PUBOL_DVSN_YN /* 공직자구분여부 */ , AUD_PEN_NAM /* 감사자성명 */ , ACT_INF_NM /* 계좌정보명 */ , MNTY_ORG_INF_NM /* 금융기관정보명 */ , FRT_USR_ID /* 최초사용자ID */ , FNL_USR_ID /* 최종사용자ID */ , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD /* 최종거래부서코드 */ , FNL_MNU_ID /* 최종메뉴 ID */ , FRT_REGI_DH /* 최초등록일시 */ , FNL_MDF_DH /* 최종수정일시 */ FROM TBBADJFS002D WHERE YR = #YR# AND DPT_CD = #DPT_CD# AND SLN = #SLN# AND IS_NO = #IS_NO#
